name: Allow Word/Powerpoint/Excel file uploads
author: yohman

sections.description: This plugin allows you to upload Word, Powerpoint and Excel files (doc, docx, ppt, pptx, xls and xlsx) through the media library uploader.
sections.installation:
1. Upload allow-word-powerpoint-file-uploads.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release

1.1

  • Added Excel files (xls, xlsx)

1.1.1

  • changed function name to prevent possible conflicts with other functions

short_description: This plugin allows you to upload Word, Powerpoint and Excel files through the media library uploader.
description: This plugin allows you to upload Word, Powerpoint and Excel files (doc, docx, ppt, pptx, xls and xlsx) through the media library uploader.

upgrade_notice.1.1: use v1.1 if you need Excel file uploads as well
upgrade_notice.1.1.1: • changed function name to prevent possible conflicts with other functions
